name: New iCut
description:
*** Search for Puzzlium - the 1st puzzle social network. SOLVE thousands of fun, addictive puzzles. CREATE new puzzles to challenge anyone in the world. COMPETE with other solvers. ***

Discover a brand-new puzzle to get your brain skills to a new level! Goal is simple: cut shapes into identical parts. Puzzles are of increasing difficulty up to almost impossible nuts.

HOT NEWS
Over 800 000 downloads! Check it out why thousands are addicted to iCut - a new tool of cutting the shapes.

FEATURES
• 1008 hand-crafted puzzles (800 to unlock).
• 6 distinctive playmodes and 4 gamelevels.
• Designed for iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad.
• Scores: reach the best score in each puzzle.
• Guest players: get your friends to play!
• Need help? Use advanced hint system.
• Reset All Puzzles option.
• Game Center achievements and leaderboards.

PRESS QUOTES
***** "A new type of puzzle game" - App Advice

***** "Brand new puzzle." - Touch Arcade Forums

***** "A light, easy game that’s fun for a few minutes." - Games Uncovered

***** "Puzzle fans should be delighted..." - DIYgamer
